content: lion brand pattern # 649 *cim-triangleshawl pdf* shawl measure approx 90 across top 25 down center back without fringe lion brand imagine art no 780 2 5 oz balls 222yrds/203m 2 5oz/70g #171 moss - 5 balls crochet hook size j-10 u s 4 u k 6 00 mm gauge 11 sts = 3 / 8 row = 5 in pattern see also triangle knit shawl #689 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/triangle-knit-shawl-689
